CaptionLabel.description: This is an optional label, displayed beneath the KPI components.

items.description: Each item consists of a leading unit, a metric value and a trailing unit.

Icon.description: This can be an image from a local resource or an image from web (HTTPS only).

ShowProgress.description:
This determines if the KPI Progress View should be enabled. 

 For Android, KPI Progress View will appear only if, there is a single `MetricItem` in `MetricItems` array and this `MetricItem` has `Value` that contains '/' or `TrailingUnit` that is equal to '%'.

Progress.description: This is used only when `ShowProgress` is enabled. This is used only for iOS, not for Android.
